ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_1: My name is Marco Antonio Cruz Gabino, but you can call me Marco. My journey into programming began at the young age of 16. I started my path using PSeInt as my first pseudolanguage, an experience that laid the foundation for my fascination with problem-solving and programming logic.
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: A significant milestone in my career is the conception and development of a system designed to search for development, design, and more tools. This initiative resulted from my participation in the 'Programming Day' Hackathon held in 2022, where I had the honor of securing the third position.
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_3: Currently, I am actively seeking employment opportunities as a frontend developer, aiming to apply my knowledge and skills to create solutions that help people address their challenges.

PROJECTS.name: Cloud Box
PROJECTS.description: This is a cloud storage service that allows users to upload and download files. Here you can also create folders and subfolders to organize your files

PROJECTS.name: Info Reader
PROJECTS.description: This is a web application that allows you to read technology news, using RSS feeds from different sources and saving them in a database. It also allows you to create a user account and save your favorite news.

PROJECTS.name: Smart Dental
PROJECTS.description: This application allows you to manage a dental clinic, it allows you to guide a history of the patient, manage the appointments, inventory, employees and patients.

PROJECTS.name: Bon Appetito App
PROJECTS.description: Here you can buy or build your own pizza, choose the ingredients and the size of the pizza, and then you can order it.

PROJECTS.name: Guess Word Game
PROJECTS.description: This a game where you have to guess the answer to a question. Depending on the difficulty level, you will have a certain number of attempts to guess the answer. The game ends when you run out of attempts or you guess the answer correctly

PROJECTS.name: Twitter Clone
PROJECTS.description: This is a clone of the Twitter application, it allows you to create a user account, post tweets, follow other users, like tweets, etc.

PROJECTS.name: Memory Game
PROJECTS.description: This is a memory game, you have to find the pairs of cards, you have 3 levels of difficulty, easy, medium and hard.

PROJECTS.name: Unit Converter
PROJECTS.description: This is a unit converter, you can convert from one unit to another, it has different categories, such as length, weight, volume, etc.
